1 ^ Praise the Lord: 2 ^ Praise ye the God of gods
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 3 ^ Praise ye the Lord of lords
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 4 ^ Who alone doth great wonders
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 5 ^ Who made the heavens in understanding
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 6 ^ Who established the earth above the waters
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 7 ^ Who made the great lights
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 8 ^ The sun to rule the day
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 9 ^ The moon and the stars to rule the night
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 10 ^ Who smote Egypt with their firstborn
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 11 ^ Who brought out Israel from among them
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 12 ^ With a mighty hand and with a stretched out arm
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 13 ^ Who divided the Red Sea into parts
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 14 ^ And brought out Israel through the midst thereof
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 15 ^ And overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red Sea
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 16 ^ Who led his people through the desert
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 17 ^ Who smote great kings
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 18 ^ And slew strong kings
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 19 ^ Sehon king of the Amorites
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 20 ^ And Og king of Basan
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 21 ^ And he gave their land for an inheritance
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 22 ^ For an inheritance to his servant Israel
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 23 ^ For he was mindful of us in our affliction
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 24 ^ And he redeemed us from our enemies
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 25 ^ Who giveth food to all flesh
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 26 ^ Give glory to the God of heaven
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.

1 ^ Praise the Lord: 27 ^ Give glory to the Lord of lords
for he is good: for his mercy is for ever.
